entry.def: Ideological means relating to principles or beliefs.

Sentence.sentence: Meanwhile, Europe has fallen prey to a different ideological trap: the belief that European governments would always have infinite resources and could continue borrowing as if there were no tomorrow.

sentences.en: He always tries to link his study with his ideological problems.
sentences.cn: 他总是把学习和自己的思想问题联系起来。

sentences.en: He helped me enormously with advice on how to do ideological work.
sentences.cn: 他告诉我怎样做思想工作,对我有很大帮助。
